text: François Leterrier (26 May 1929 – 4 December 2020) was a French director and actor. He was cast in Robert Bresson's movie A Man Escaped. He was born in Oise, France. He directed the 1961 movie Les Mauvais Coups. Leterrier died on 4 December 2020 in Paris at the age of 91.Mort du cinéaste François Leterrier, réalisateur des «Babas cool» et de «Good bye Emmanuelle» ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French movie directors
title: François Leterrier
